page.title: 08GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {Bulldogs:}To play this game you have two people who are "it" and as many others as you like.The object is for the others to run from one end of the playground to the other without getting caught.The last two caught are "it" next time.{Joanne Oke {Offground it:}To play this,one person is choosen to be "it" and he/she has to catch the others when they are on ground level.Once caught that person becomes "it".This can go on for as long as you like. {Stick-in-the-mud:}One person is choosen to be "it" and the others run freely.If caught by "it",that person has to stand still with their legs apart unless another free person passes under them.When every one is caught,the last one caught becomes "it" for the next time
